# custom

# Custom

Kind: global class

  • Custom
    • .greeting(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>
    • .booster(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>
    • .rank(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>
    • .levelUp(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>

# custom.greeting(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>

Creates a customisable greeting image with Icon, Name, Greet and Background. Optional parameters can let you customise the color of each element, or let you add a message.

Kind: instance method of Custom
Returns: Promise.<buffer> - The generated image in a buffer.

Param Type Default Description
options Object The options that contain the required parameters.
options.icon string The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)
options.background string The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif) (1024x470 recommended)
options.name string The name of the greeted user.
options.greet string What should the user be greeted with?
[options.message] string Provide a message on the bottom of the user's name.
[options.greetHex] string "000000" The color of the greet text. (Do not include the hashtag).
[options.nameHex] string "000000" The color of the name text. (Do not include the hashtag).
[options.circleHex] string "000000" The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).
[options.messageHex] string "000000" The color of the message text. (Do not include the hashtag).

# custom.booster(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>

Creates a customisable booster add/remove image with Icon, Name and Background. Optional queries can let you customise the color of each element.

Kind: instance method of Custom
Returns: Promise.<buffer> - The generated image in a buffer.

Param Type Default Description
options Object The options that contain the required parameters.
options.icon string The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)
options.background string The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif) (1024x470 recommended)
options.name string The name of the user who boosted the server.
options.title string The title of the booster card.
[options.message] string Provide a message on the bottom of title.
[options.titleHex] string "f47fff" The color of the title text. (Do not include the hashtag).
[options.nameHex] string "FFFFFF" The color of the name text. (Do not include the hashtag).
[options.circleHex] string "9f50a7" The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).
[options.messageHex] string "9f50a7" The color of the message text. (Do not include the hashtag).

# custom.rank(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>

Creates a customisable rank card with Icon, Name, and leveling stats.

Kind: instance method of Custom
Returns: Promise.<buffer> - The generated image in a buffer.

Param Type Description
options Object The options that contain the required parameters.
options.avatar string The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)
options.username string The username to print.
options.bgColor string The color of the background.
options.level number The Level the user is currently on.
options.xp number How much XP the user has.

# custom.levelUp(options) ⇒ Promise.<buffer>

Creates a customisable level up card.

Kind: instance method of Custom
Returns: Promise.<buffer> - The generated image in a buffer.

Param Type Description
options Object The options that contain the required parameters.
options.avatar string The link to an image (.png, .jpg, .gif)
options.bgColor string The color of the background. (Do not include the hashtag).
options.borderColor string The color of the avatar border. (Do not include the hashtag).
options.oldlevel number The old level of the user.
options.newlevel number The new level of the user.
